props.name: selectedItems
props.description: Collection of IDs for the currently selected items

props.name: showHeader
props.description: Boolean to show or hide the header

props.name: loading
props.description: Overlays item list with a spinner while a background action is being performed

props.name: items
props.description: Item data; each item is passed to renderItem

props.name: pagination
props.description: Properties to enable pagination at the bottom of the list.

props.name: sortOptions
props.description: Collection of sort options to choose from

value.name: value
value.description: Machine value of the option; this is the value passed to `onChange`

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Option will be visible, but not selectable

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: Element to display to the left of the option label. Does not show in the dropdown.

key.name: key
key.description: Unique key applied to the option element. Defaults to option value prop when undefined.

props.name: selectable
props.description: Renders a Select All button at the top of the list and checkboxes in front of each list item. For use when bulkActions aren't provided. *

props.name: resourceName
props.description: Name of the resource, such as customers or products

props.name: hasMoreItems
props.description: Whether or not there are more items than currently set on the items prop. Determines whether or not to set the paginatedSelectAllAction and paginatedSelectAllText props on the BulkActions component.

props.name: promotedBulkActions
props.description: Up to 2 bulk actions that will be given more prominence

accessibilityLabel.name: accessibilityLabel
accessibilityLabel.description: Visually hidden text for screen readers

helpText.name: helpText
helpText.description: Additional hint text to display with item

schema: ComponentOptions<any, any, any, ComputedOptions, MethodOptions, any, any, any, any>
ComponentPublicInstanceConstructor<any, any, any, any, ComputedOptions, MethodOptions>
ComponentOptions<any, any, any, ComputedOptions, MethodOptions, any, any, any, any>
ComponentPublicInstanceConstructor<any, any, any, any, ComputedOptions, MethodOptions>

tags.name: deprecated
tags.text: Add an ellipsis suffix to action content. ellipsis appends `...` without truncating. Use truncate instead.

truncate.name: truncate
truncate.description: Truncate the action content either at the beginning or at the end

active.name: active
active.description: Whether the action is active or not

role.name: role
role.description: Defines a role for the action

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Whether or not the action is disabled

id.name: id
id.description: A unique identifier for the action

url.name: url
url.description: A destination to link to, rendered in the action

external.name: external
external.description: Forces url to open in a new tab

onAction.name: onAction
onAction.description: Callback when an action takes place

index.name: index
index.description: Zero-indexed numerical position. Overrides the group's order in the menu.

onActionAnyItem.name: onActionAnyItem
onActionAnyItem.description: Callback when any action takes place

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: Callback when the menu is clicked

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Whether or not the action is disabled

id.name: id
id.description: A unique identifier for the action

accessibilityLabel.name: accessibilityLabel
accessibilityLabel.description: Visually hidden text for screen readers

url.name: url
url.description: A destination to link to, rendered in the action

external.name: external
external.description: Forces url to open in a new tab

onAction.name: onAction
onAction.description: Callback when an action takes place

props.name: bulkActions
props.description: Actions available on the currently selected items

items.name: items
items.description: Collection of action items for the list

accessibilityLabel.name: accessibilityLabel
accessibilityLabel.description: Visually hidden text for screen readers

helpText.name: helpText
helpText.description: Additional hint text to display with item

tags.text: Add an ellipsis suffix to action content. ellipsis appends `...` without truncating. Use truncate instead.

truncate.name: truncate
truncate.description: Truncate the action content either at the beginning or at the end

active.description: Whether the action is active or not

external.name: external

url.name: url

external.name: external

onAction.name: onAction
onAction.description: Callback when an action takes place

props.name: flushFilters
props.description: Whether to remove all padding around the filter controls. Should be true if using Filters, and false if using LegacyFilters.

props.name: isFiltered
props.description: Whether or not the list has filter(s) applied

props.name: sortValue
props.description: Current value of the sort control

props.name: headerContent
props.description: Custom header text displayed above the list instead of the resource count.

props.name: idForItem
props.description: Function to customize the unique ID for each item

props.name: resolveItemId
props.description: Function to resolve the ids of items

events.name: selection-change
events.description: Callback when sort option is changed

slots.name: emptyState
slots.description: The markup to display when no resources exist yet. Renders when set and items is empty.

slots.name: emptySearchState
slots.description: The markup to display when no results are returned on search or filter of the list. Renders when `filterControl` is set, items are empty, and `emptyState` is not set.

slots.name: alternateTool
slots.description: Node to display instead of the sort control
